##Overview of variables

#Charitable food site variables (only available for charitable food sites)
#Eligibility
**eligibility_requirements {STR}: Provides a description of the different eligibility requirements that a food site has.
**eligibility_requirement {BYTE}: Dicho variable indicating whether a food site has any eligibility requirement.
<b>blac </b>

#Frequency
**day {STR}
**frequency {STR}: Provides description of when food sites are open to the public.
**frequency_visit {FLOAT}: categorical variable (1-Weekly or more frequently, 2-less than weekly, monthly or more, 3-other frequency). 
**weekends {BYTE}: flag to identify sites that are open at any time during the weekend
**yearly {BYTE}: flat to identify sites that are open year-round
